author: tmiller
msg: fixed null ptr exception with sax sources that did

author: santiagopg
msg: Added a type mapping between 'reference' and 'java.lang.Object' and
vice versa. With this addition, a stylesheet can pass a parameter
to an external Java function without getting a type check error.

author: jkesselm
msg: Merge ExtendedType changes from main branch

author: jkesselm
msg: Easy enable/disable of XNI support for testing purposes,
and some error-reporting cleanup. We still fail a few API tests
in XNI mode, mostly related to error handling.

author: santiagopg
msg: Ensured that global vars are initialized in the order in which they
were defined, whenever possible. This order may be altered due to
the existence of dependencies between the vars.
